Minute Entry for proceedings held before US Magistrate Judge Camille L. Velez- Rive:Arraignment/Detention as to Alfredo Figueroa-Perez (1) Count 1,2 held on 3/11/2015. Present were AUSA Carlos Cardona and Mr. Jose Romo-Matienzo. Defendant was present and under custody. He was found competent at this time to understand the proceedings. Defendant waived the reading of the indictment and entered a plea of not guilty as to both counts. The parties will have 7 days for discovery and 14 days thereafter to file any motions. Case is referred to Judge Gelpi for scheduling. As to bail, the Government requested detention and proffered evidence against this defendant. Mr. Romo argued for bail and offered bail conditions. Sidebar held. After hearing the arguments from the parties, the Court ruled that defendant deserved an opportunity since he had no prior record, his family was present in Court supporting him. Bail was set in the amount of $10,000.00 unsecured with defendant's signature and the signature of a family member who works, home incarceration with EM, plus standard conditions of release.
